java/liquibase/util/LiquibaseUtil.java

00001 package liquibase.util;
00002 
00003 import java.io.IOException;
00004 import java.io.InputStream;
00005 import java.net.URL;
00006 import java.util.Properties;
00007 
00008 public class LiquibaseUtil {
00009     public static String getBuildVersion() {
00010         Properties buildInfo = new Properties();
00011         URL buildInfoFile = Thread.currentThread().getContextClassLoader().getResource("buildinfo.properties");
00012         try {
00013             if (buildInfoFile == null) {
00014                 return "UNKNOWN";
00015             } else {
00016                 InputStream in = buildInfoFile.openStream();
00017 
00018                 buildInfo.load(in);
00019                 String o = (String) buildInfo.get("build.version");
00020                 if (o == null) {
00021                     return "UNKNOWN";
00022                 } else {
00023                     return o;
00024                 }
00025             }
00026         } catch (IOException e) {
00027             return "UNKNOWN";
00028         }
00029     }
00030 }
